mapper.select: SELECT publisherid, name, code, note, rtime, mtime, postback_url, event_url FROM publisher WHERE publisherid=#{publisherid} LIMIT 1
SELECT publisherid, name, code, note, rtime, mtime, postback_url, event_url FROM publisher WHERE code=#{code} LIMIT 1
SELECT count(1) FROM publisher WHERE 1=1 AND code like CONCAT('%',#{searchkeyword},'%') AND name like CONCAT('%',#{searchkeyword},'%')

SELECT publisherid, name, code, note, rtime, mtime, postback_url, event_url FROM publisher WHERE 1=1 AND code like CONCAT('%',#{searchkeyword},'%') AND name like CONCAT('%',#{searchkeyword},'%') ORDER BY publisherid DESC
LIMIT #{count} offset #{start}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO publisher ( name, code, note, rtime, mtime, postback_url, event_url ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{code}, #{note}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{postback_url}, #{event_url} )
mapper.update: UPDATE publisher SET name = #{name}, note = #{note}, postback_url = #{postback_url}, event_url = #{event_url}, mtime = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE publisherid = #{publisherid}
